user_flow_title: Removing Friends from Friend Activity Feed

steps.start: Turn on the Friend Activity sidebar on your app
steps.interface: The Friend Activity feed displays a list of your friends along with their current tracks and playlists.

steps.action: View the list of your friends in the Friend Activity feed, and click on the username of the friend you want to remove.
steps.interface: The profile page of the selected user is displayed in the middle section of the app. Under their headshot, there is a square 'Following' button and a three-dot button representing 'More'.

steps.system_action: The system checks the connection mechanism of the selected user, and finds that the selected user is a synced Facebook friend.
steps.interface: In the middle section - the user's profile page - the square button turns into 'Follow'. On the right section - the Friend Activity sidebar - the unwanted user still appears in the list of existing friends' listening activity.

In the middle section - the user's profile page - the square button turns into 'Follow'. On the right section - the Friend Activity sidebar - the unwanted user still appears in the list of existing friends' listening activity.
steps.false_reasoning: The unwanted user still appears in the list of existing friends' listening activity.

steps.start: Turn on the Friend Activity sidebar on your app
steps.interface: The Friend Activity feed displays a list of your friends along with their current tracks and playlists.

steps.action: View the list of your friends in the Friend Activity feed, and click on the username of the friend you want to remove.
steps.interface: The profile page of the selected user is displayed in the middle section of the app. Under their headshot, there is a square 'Following' button and a three-dot button representing 'More'.

steps.system_action: The system checks the connection mechanism of the selected user, and finds that the selected user is a mutual-followed friend on the Music app.
steps.interface: On the user profile page, under their headshot, the square button changes to 'Follow'. At the same time, the user disappears from the Friend Activity feed on the right section.
On the user profile page, under their headshot, the square button changes to 'Follow'. At the same time, the user disappears from the Friend Activity feed on the right section.
steps.true_reasoning: The user disappears from the Friend Activity feed successfully.

steps.start: Turn on the Friend Activity sidebar on your app
steps.interface: The Friend Activity feed displays a list of your friends along with their current tracks and playlists.

steps.action: View the list of your friends in the Friend Activity feed, and click on the username of the friend you want to remove.
steps.interface: The profile page of the selected user is displayed in the middle section of the app. Under their headshot, there is a square 'Following' button and a three-dot button representing 'More'.
A drop-down menu shows four options: Unfollow, Block, Report, and Copy Link to Profile. The 'Unfollow' option has a green icon, while the other three have gray icons.

steps.system_action: The system checks the connection mechanism of the selected 'unfollow' user, and finds that the selected user is a synced Facebook friend.
steps.interface: In the middle section - the user's profile page - the square button turns into 'Follow'. On the right section - the Friend Activity sidebar - the unwanted user still appears in the list of existing friends' listening activity.

In the middle section - the user's profile page - the square button turns into 'Follow'. On the right section - the Friend Activity sidebar - the unwanted user still appears in the list of existing friends' listening activity.
steps.false_reasoning: The unwanted user still appears in the list of existing friends' listening activity.

A drop-down menu shows four options: Unfollow, Block, Report, and Copy Link to Profile. The 'Unfollow' option has a green icon, while the other three have gray icons.

steps.interface: On the user profile page, under their headshot, the square button changes to 'Follow'. At the same time, the user disappears from the Friend Activity feed on the right section.
On the user profile page, under their headshot, the square button changes to 'Follow'. At the same time, the user disappears from the Friend Activity feed on the right section.

steps.start: Turn on the Friend Activity sidebar on your app
steps.interface: The Friend Activity feed displays a list of your friends along with their current tracks and playlists.

steps.action: View the list of your friends in the Friend Activity feed, and click on the username of the friend you want to remove.
steps.interface: The profile page of the selected user is displayed in the middle section of the app. Under their headshot, there is a square 'Following' button and a three-dot button representing 'More'.
A drop-down menu shows four options: Unfollow, Block, Report, and Copy Link to Profile. The 'Unfollow' option has a green icon, while the other three have gray icons.

A pop-up window appears with the title 'Block {the selected user}?' and the message '{the selected user} will no longer be able to see your profile, follow you, or see your listening activity.' There are two buttons below this message: a gray 'Cancel' button and a green 'Block' button.

steps.action: Click on the 'Block' button in the pop-up window.
steps.interface: On the user profile page, under their headshot, the square button changes to 'Follow'. At the same time, the user disappears from the Friend Activity feed on the right section.
On the user profile page, under their headshot, the square button changes to 'Follow'. At the same time, the user disappears from the Friend Activity feed on the right section.
steps.true_reasoning: The user disappears from your Friend Activity feed successfully.
